titleStmt.title: The churches patience and faith in afflictions. Delivered in a sermon at the funerall of the right worshipfull, and vertuous Cecilia Lady Peyton, October, 30. In the parish church of Southfleet in Kent. By George Eves, rector of Hartley, neare adjoyning thereunto.
titleStmt.author: Eves, George, 1613 or 14-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for G. Bedell, and T. Collins, at the Middle-Temple Gate in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: 31"; the second 1 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
